content: Hey Darius. Wasn’t it you publishing a post on how to skim through the context of self-teaching guides in almost no time? I might be exaggerating a bit, but by dropping the essay style in favour of lists of does and don’ts you subject your (recent) posts to the very same technique applied by your readers. Loosing readers will then be the next step. Subjective, I know, but it is the way it goes for me.
